page.title: 12HALF MARATHON
page.content: THE THIRSK HALF MARATHON WAS HELD ON 14TH JULY AND STARTED AT 11A.M. AT 9A.M. PEOPLE WHO WERE LATE ENTRIES WERE GETTING THERE NUMBERS. AT 10.45 THE RUNNERS WERE ASKED TO GO TO THE ROAD AND GET READY.THEY WERE ASKED TO GO INTO A FIELD AND GET INTO THEIR ROWS. AT 11.03 THE HOOTER WENT AND THEY WERE OFF.THE ROUTE WENT THROUGH THORNTON-LE-STREET TO THORNTON-LE-MOOR ,SOUTH OTTERINGTON TO SANDHUTTON,THROUGH CARLTON MINIOTT AND BACK TO THIRSK RACECOURSE TO FINISH.IN FRONT OF THE RUNNERS WAS A TIME-CAR. THE WINNER TOOK 1 HOUR AND 10 MINUTES. WHEN THE RUNNERS FINISHED THEY WENT BEHIND THE STAND TO COLLECT THEIR MEDAL AND CERTIFICATE.
